name: researcher
description: Agent for data analysis and research tasks

files.content:
# Researcher Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Data analysis, research, and scientific computing

## Capabilities
- Python data analysis (pandas, numpy, scipy)
- Machine learning (scikit-learn)
- Data visualization (matplotlib, seaborn)
- Jupyter notebooks
- Web scraping

## Installed Tools
- Python 3.10+
- pip, virtualenv
- Jupyter Lab
- Common data science libraries

setup_tasks.command: pip3 install --no-cache-dir jupyter pandas numpy scipy matplotlib seaborn scikit-learn requests beautifulsoup4
